summary: WAS DRIVING ON HIGHWAY AT 60 MPH WHEN VEHICLE CUT OUT. FUEL GUAGE READ 1/4 TANK, BUT VEHICLE WOULD NOT RESTART. VEHICLE WAS TOWED TO DEALER WHO SAID THE FUEL SENDING UNIT WAS BAD. ALTHOUGH THERE WAS A RECALL FOR THIS TYPE OF FAILURE, DEALER SAID VEHICLES MADE IN 8/96 WERE NOT COVERED UNDER RECALL. CALLED CHRYSLER, BUT THEY WOULD NOT PAY FOR REPAIRS.*JB
